DataElement.preferredName: Prior Steroid Therapy Greater Than 24 Hour Therapeutic Procedure 2 Week Prior Diagnosis Receive Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicated as to whether a patient has received greater than 24 hours of steroid therapy prior to diagnosis.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prior Steroid Therapy Greater Than 24 Hour Therapeutic Procedure 2 Week Prior Diagnosis Receive
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order._Treatment with corticosteroid drugs to reduce swelling, pain, and other symptoms of inflammation._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::24_A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::2_Any period of seven consecutive days._Earlier in time or order._The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation._To take, accept, or get something offered.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:Treatment with corticosteroid drugs to reduce swelling, pain, and other symptoms of inflammation.

Concepts.definition: The use of exogenous steroids for the treatment of any disease or disorder.

Property.preferredName: Greater Than Integer::24 Hour Therapeutic Procedure Integer::2 Week Prior Diagnosis Receive
Property.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::24:A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::2:Any period of seven consecutive days.:Earlier in time or order.:The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.:To take, accept, or get something offered.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
Any period of seven consecutive days.

The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.
To take, accept, or get something offered.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
